songs.title: Happy Holiday Hoe
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]:
Throw down that shit nigga

[Verse 1]:
Bitch I'm a mothafuckin' G
Bitch you ain't fucking with me
I be stabbing bitches
Fucking hoes with no condom on

[Hook]
Happy holiday ho
Happy holiday
Happy holiday

[Verse 2]:
Bitch I be kicking babies
Fucking bitches (Why are you doing this slut?)
Hoes in the club
Ho, don't eat my grits bitch
Dont touch my trix
Barking at the hoes
Barking at the hoes
Niggas better recognize that I be stabin' niggas
Stabing niggas with pencils niggas
Fucking bitches with no comdom

[Outro]:
Bitch better have my chicken
I want my Popeye's, niggas
